General.Name: Quest Products Corp
General.Description: Quest Patent Research Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an intellectual property asset management company in the United States. The company engages in the acquisition, licensing, and enforcement of intellectual property rights. It owns, controls, and manages 15 intellectual property portfolios, which primarily consist of patent rights. The company was formerly known as Quest Products Corporation and changed its name to Quest Patent Research Corporation in June 2007. Quest Patent Research Corporation was incorporated in 1987 and is based in Rye, New York.
General.Address: 411 Theodore Fremd Avenue, Rye, NY, United States, 10580-1411
